channel.title: GonnaCry, a linux Ransomware
channel.description:
Hi there !
I start developing this ransomware since the spread of the wide world famous wannacry ransomware. There is two versions of the GonnaCry code: C and Python.
Actually i'm working on the C version. I would appreciate u guys take a look.
the github link to the project: https://github.com/tarcisio-marinho/GonnaCry
